Detailed Description

Servo Motor's descripting structure.

The data stored insiThde this kind of structure is used for various purposes, such as PID Control, Average Speed computation and things like that.

Field Documentation

U32 counter

Circular Array Counter for AVG Speed Computing.

U8 port

Servo Motor's Port.

F32 powers[3]

Last three RAW Powers set.

Used by the PID controller or, if on RAW Power Control, only the first value is used to set the power.

S32 previous_counter

Previous Slot in the Circular Array.

U32 revolutions[SAMP_NUM]

Last SAMP_NUM Tachometric Readings.

Used by the avg() function to compute the Average Speed for the current Servo Motor.

S8 speed_control_type

Kind of Speed Control for this Servo Motor.

Please refer to the Definitions to know which values shall be used for this variable.

F32 speed_errors[3]

Last three Speed Errors.

This is the difference between the motor_t::speed_ref and the current Average Speed. This value is needed by the PID Controller.

U32 speed_ref

Target speed for PID Controller.

F32 speeds[SAMP_NUM]

Last SAMP_NUM Average Speeds.
